snippet.title: Farming 6-in-1 bundle - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
[NOTE: The game is officially being delisted from Steam on July 14th, 2024. Why it's being delisted is anyone's guess.]

This compilation features six time management games related to farming: My Farm Life, My Farm Life 2, Terrafarmers, Tropical Farm, Virtual Farm and Virtual Farm 2. While the games themselves are available to get separately on sites like Big Fish Games (or even physically), those games never saw any standalone releases on Steam. Therefore, this bundle is literally the only way to get these games via Steam. It also comes with a bonus of Steam Trading Cards.

Farming 6-in-1 bundle (C) ESDigital Games Ltd (formerly Buka Entertainment) / Alawar Entertainment
Developed by Alawar Entertainment / Amegami / Aliasworlds / Rionix / Melesta
